Package beans.statistic

Class SimpleStatisticManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.statistic.SimpleStatisticManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatisticManager
    public class SimpleStatisticManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticManager
    This class is a simple implementation of StatisticManager interface. It implements methods of interface to control process of collecting information about searched words from downloaded text/html files.

    It uses threadsafe realisation of collections, cause it runs collectors StatisticCollector object in separated threads.

    Summary statistics are written to a CSV file

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Verbitsky Sergey
    See Also:
    StatisticResult, StatisticManager, CopyOnWriteArraySet, BlockingQueue, CopyOnWriteArrayList, AtomicInteger, Executors
